jobDescription: Data Scientist  Are you a Data Scientist who has machine learning and coding experience (Scala, Python)? If so, read on...  We are the adtech arm of a large media conglomerate. Due to recent growth, we are looking to add a data science team to our already established top notch technology team! You will get to work with some of LA's brightest minds, have a strong work/life balance and enjoy coming to work every day! Top Reasons to Work with Us
